title: Mondraker CHASER X Range Aims for eMTB Capability in Urban Settings
content:
Urban riding is hard on bikes, and urban bikes are hard on booties. Enter Mondraker’s CHASER X range: two eMTBs attempting to bring off-road heritage…

The post Mondraker CHASER X Range Aims for eMTB Capability in Urban Settings appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
